description:
Our family friendly sunny and cozy 2 bedroom apartment is less than a block away from Central Park. Our home is fully stocked and equipped with everything you might need, from bedding, blankets and towels to coffee maker and food processor. It is conveniently located near subways lines 2,3 & 6.

Kitchen table seats comfortably five people.The open kitchen is full of sunlight and it connected with the living room that has TV and a sleeping couch. One bedroom has a full size bed and another bedroom has a beautiful couch that can be easily converted into a queen size bed.

The whole space is for you to enjoy!

My husband and I will always be reachable by phone or in person if needed. We'll do our best to make your stay pleasant and enjoyable. We'll be glad to give any helpful information or suggestions.

There is nothing better than Central Park next to your home. You can enjoy morning or afternoon jog or stroll in the park, it is also a most relaxing place after a full day in the city.

Mt Sinai Hospital and Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai are just  five blocks away. 

It is situated at the northern edge of Museum Mile.

Taxi, Uber, Gett and subway make a very easy access to our home. Nearby subway lines: 2, 3 & 6.

You are welcome to enjoy the gym and sundeck in our building.
name: 2Bdr by Central Park Sunny, Cozy & Family Friendly
review: Un accueil et une réactivité parfaite. Le logement est vraiment bien situé et les pièces sont de bonnes tailles .
